findings.description: Ensure that the API server pod is not running with privileged access
findings.remediation: Reconfigure the API server pod to remove privileged access.

findings.description: Ensure containers use a non-root user
findings.remediation: Modify container specifications to use non-root users.

findings.description: Ensure K8s Secrets are encrypted at rest
findings.remediation: Configure encryption for Kubernetes Secrets using a provider.

findings.description: Ensure Kubelet configuration file permissions are set to 644 or more restrictive
findings.remediation: Adjust file permissions for the Kubelet configuration file.
